QuestData.Title: Mangletooth
QuestData.Description: I no longer care for honor or glory, $c. All that matters to me is that the quilboar die, by any means, at anyone's hand.$B$BMangletooth, the chief of these filthy Razormane, sits in his lair to the northwest, atop a hill. End his life.$B$BI plan to stay here, and pile these bodies until no more vermin run squealing from the Kraul to face me...
QuestData.RewardText: Good. Good! They will all die! Their chieftains, and their women, and their children, and their foul pets!
